sourceMeaningMnemonic: You're walking at night when you discover a <radical>lantern</radical> covered entirely in <radical>hair</radical>, making it a very strange <kanji>shape</kanji>. In fact, this is a <kanji>form</kanji> you'd never expect a lantern to take.
meaningInfo: Picture all the different shapes this hairy lantern could take in your mind.
readingMnemonic: You stare at the <kanji>shape</kanji> until you finally recognize it: <reading>ca</reading>ke (<ja>けい</ja>)! Well, it's hairy, glowing cake, but it's still shaped like a big slice of cake.
readingInfo: Picture the shape of this hairy, glowing cake.
